original_text: When Esau was forty years old, he took Judith the daughter of Beeri the Hittite to be his wife, and Basemath the daughter of Elon the Hittite,
korean_text: 에서가 사십 세에 헷 족속 브에리의 딸 유딧과 헷 족속 엘론의 딸 바스맛을 아내로 맞이하였더니

sentences.original_text: When Esau was forty years old
he took Judith the daughter of Beeri the Hittite to be his wife
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 헷 족속 브에리의 딸 유딧을 아내로 삼았고

sentences.original_text: and Basemath the daughter of Elon the Hittite
sentences.korean_translation: 헷 족속 엘론의 딸 바세맛도 아내로 삼았다
